TopicTitle: Mech that can walk and jump. Kangaroo style.

Articles.Content:
Is it an Ostrich? Is it a Kangaroo? Is it an Ostricharoo?

It is my latest creation. And it needs B9, MechJeb and Infernal Robotics to work.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yPvHepct3A8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

You can get it here:

[http://www./download/dda7jo6atlfep44/WalkerConcept_4.craft](http://www./download/dda7jo6atlfep44/WalkerConcept_4.craft)

[http://www./download/bx3ali29dnnq143/WalkerConcept_4_JUMPER.craft](http://www./download/bx3ali29dnnq143/WalkerConcept_4_JUMPER.craft)

Action Groups:

1 - extend left leg

2 - contract left leg

3 - extend right leg

4 - contract right leg

7 - toggle ladders and exit lights

8 - arm/disarm grapplers

9 - open solar panels

0 - toogle antennae

And if anyone can write a kOS script for this to make it easier to walk, I would be forever grateful ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Shut up and take my rep!

It's both odd and magnificent at the same time, I love it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This is so cool! Crazy Robot Canguru!
One YouTube commenter gave me an idea: try to jump that thing into the Mohole... maybe I'll just do that ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
